title: Collegiate font help
content:
I see Arial in this image for the secondary text but can not identify the East and (C)ounty font.

Anyone have any ideas? Appreciate it!

Font: 

 No 

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [EastCounty.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415135752/http:/typophile.com/files/EastCounty.jpg) | 77.6 KB |
author: shootzy

comments.content: It must be **[Bookman Old Style (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415135752/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=MS-Windows-Fonts&ffam=Bookman%20Old%20Style%20-%20Bold&fid=e6ad3e9485e85796a3ebb481164abee7&fsize=60&text=EAST%20COUNTY&wrap=2)** which is distributed with MS-Windows O/S
Thanks you guys! Really appreciate the quick response.
